alert.note: Alert for Central Highlands; Far Northwest Highlands; Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass; Northeast Highlands; Upper Rio Grande Valley (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Heat Advisory issued July 18 at 1:26PM MDT until July 18 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...High temperatures between 98 and 102. * WHERE...Central Highlands, Far Northwest Highlands, Upper Rio Grande Valley, Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass, and Northeast Highlands. * WHEN...Until 9 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures may cause heat illnesses.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. Take extra precautions when outside. Wear lightweight and loose fitting clothing. Try to limit strenuous activities to early morning or evening. Take action when you see symptoms of heat exhaustion and heat stroke.

area.areaDesc: Central Highlands; Far Northwest Highlands; Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass; Northeast Highlands; Upper Rio Grande Valley
